One of the most intelligent and serialized drama on broadcast television ever.
I don't want to say goodbye
How could I think the first 6 seasons were SO GOOD and the last one SO BAD???

A much flawed episode (never liked inside-Alicia's-head narrative) in a somewhat repetitive season. But oh the ending! To borrow NYT's word, if TGW is about 'compromises in an imperfect world,' then the finale embodies this theme to pure & absolute perfection. Thank you all.

And you wondered what would be a good finale
And now you're all alone, as you always deserved to be
